Public Member Functions

void cluster ()

Detailed Description

Clustering for music retrieval.

Performs K-Means clustering on the set of data points, used to index the data into clusters, thereby reducing the search space to only matching clusters instead of the entire database

Definition at line 25 of file cluster.h.

Member Function Documentation

void Cluster::cluster (  ) 

Reads in the data points from table1, allocates the required storage elements. Calls the Kmeans module, to perform K-Mean clustering of the data. Writes the means and responsibilitx matrix to table 2 and table 3 respectively
